channel.title: Pouches
channel.description: so i want runecrafting pouches to hold the essence, of course. Only problem is i have more than one option. like fill, empty etc. How do i make it so i only use a certain one. So lets say i click fill, it fills up the bag with 3 rune essence. Im using Hyperion btw. Thanks.
